item.title: Voyager Step-in Plush Dog Harness – Soft Plush, Step in Vest Harness for Small and Medium Dogs by Best Pet Supplies

item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:39:32 UTC – Details)


COMFORTABLY WALK YOUR PET NO MATTER THE WEATHER

Our all-weather harness is designed to ensure that regardless of the conditions outside, you’ll still
manage to take your pet on those walks that get their tail wagging like crazy. We’ve used mesh
material that is breathable to keep your dog or pet cool on hot days, but also provides insulation
for those chilly occasions. And it’s going to be one comfy walk for your furball! Unlike leashes
that have the tendency to strain your pet’s neck, this safety harness evenly distributes the
pressure around the chest to prevent any kind of choking.

Stress Free Walks

Is it always a struggle trying to get your pet in most harnesses? Well, you’ll love just how easy
this step in harness is to put on! Simply have your dog walk into it with their front legs, attach a
leash, and you’re good to go. But what really makes this support harness a must-have is how
secure it is. We’ve fitted it with a strong Velcro closure and heavy duty metal D-rings for double
security. So you’ll never have to worry about your dog wiggling out of the harness while on your
walks.

Here are more reasons to love this great harness:

  • Non irritating material allows for all-day wear.
  • Available in a wide range of sizes (please refer to the sizing chart).
  • Made with great attention to detail to ensure maximum durability.
  • Securely holds your pet while still being gentle.
  • Beautiful choice of colors to suit your pet’s personality

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 7 x 1 inches; 1.6 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 206-LT-S
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 15, 2013
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00B1G9M9M
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

SOFT & WARM PLUSH: Lined with a soft and warm plush fabric, this harness will keep your pet comfortable during walks on brisk days.
REFLECTIVE BANDS: Two reflective bands on the sides of this harness enhance your pet’s visibility for those early morning and late evening strolls.
THREE SAFETY FEATURES: Our hook and loop fastener, buckle and double D-rings work together protect your pet in three layers of security.
STEP IN, CLIP & GO! Step into your next walk in this simple and easy-to-wear vest harness. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!

Read more

Comfy Walk

This harness evenly distributes the pressure around the chest to prevent any kind of choking. Ideal for X-Small – Medium dogs and all cats.

Reflective Bands

Enhance your pet’s visibility with the reflective bands on the sides of this harness.

Hook & Loop Fastener

Adjust the fit of the harness and secure your pet with our strong hook & loop fastener.

Warm Plush Lining

Keep your pet cozy during those brisk morning walks in this soft and comfortable plush harness.

Read more





Step-In Lock
Step-In Air
Step-In Flex
Dual Attachment
Step-In Plush Harness & Leash
Step-In Air Harness & Leash
Features Fully customizable harness for cats and dogs Essential, every day harness that’s light as air Adjustable mesh harness with classic step-in style Dual Leash Attachment Plush-lined harness for extra comfort with Leash included Essential, every day harness that’s light as air with Leash included
Leash Attachment Points Center Back Center Back Center Back Center Back – Chest Center Back Center Back
Adjustment Points 4 3 4

“COMFORTABLY WALK YOUR PET NO MATTER THE WEATHER 
Our Step-In Air All-Weather harness is designed to ensure that regardless of the conditions outside, you'll still manage to take your pet on those walks that get their tail wagging like crazy.
 We've used mesh material that is breathable to keep your dog or pet cool on hot days but also provides insulation for those chilly occasions And it is going to be one comfy walk for your furball! Unlike leashes that have the tendency to strain your pet's neck, this safety harness evenly distributes the pressure around the chest to prevent any kind of choking. Stress-Free Walks Is it always a struggle trying to get your pet in most harnesses? 
Well, you'll love just how easy this step-in harness is to put on! Simply have your dog walk into it with their front legs, attach a leash, and you're good to go. But what really makes this support harness a must-have is how secure it is. We've fitted it with a strong closure and heavy-duty metal D-rings for double security. So you'll never have to worry about your dog wiggling out of the harness while on your walks. 
Here are more reasons to love this great harness: 
• Non-irritating material allows for all-day wear. 
• Available in a wide range of sizes (Please refer to the sizing chart). 
• Made with great attention to detail to ensure maximum durability. 
• Securely holds your pet while still being gentle. 
• Beautiful choice of colors to suit your pet's personality.“
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7 x 6 x 1 inches; 3.99 Ounces

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 4, 2020

ALL WEATHER MESH: Made with a soft, breathable air mesh, this lightweight pet harness is perfect for walks all year round.
REFLECTIVE BANDS: Two reflective bands on the sides of this harness enhance your pet’s visibility for those early morning and late evening strolls.
THREE SAFETY FEATURES: Our hook and loop fastener, buckle and double D-rings work together protect your pet in three layers of security.
STEP IN, CLIP & GO. Step into your next walk in this simple and easy-to-wear vest harness. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now.

Read more

Breathable Air Mesh

Stroll through any season in this all-weather harness crafted from our soft and supportive air mesh.

Hoop & Loop Fastener

Adjust the fit of the harness and secure your pet with our strong hook & loop fastener.

Reflective Bands

Enhance your pet’s visibility with the reflective bands on the sides of this harness.

Buckle & Double D-Ring

Slide the buckle together and clip on a leash to both D-rings for an extra layer of security.
